name: CosmiClicker
description:
Made for the Spring Clicker Jam 2023.

This is my second game ever, and I'm actually quite happy with it, even if I didn't finish everything I wanted to do.

Credits:

Literally almost everything - Me (Danthedude123)

Music - purple-planet.com

SFX - tonedock.com

Thank you to everyone who might play this game.

NOTE: As I ran out of time for the game, I was unable to playtest the final build, so let me know if you encounter anything, however I will not be able to update the game until after the jam ends.

Bugs/Oversights:

  1. You cannot currently quit from the game, you must close it yourself.
  2. A certain upgrade will let you buy it regardless of whether or not you have the funds. You will go into crippling debt.
  3. Text overlap may occur for some upgrades.
  4. You cannot buy autominers for the last planet. Oops. It was such a simple fix too.
  5. You cannot mine the later planets if you get the FOV upgrades before everything else.
